reviews.review: Very calm and chill game :) everyone is gona learn a lot of new word from russian brothers :) i recomend it. You can have experiences that change your life forever :) Enjoy it .

Fun to play though I wish the following improvements:

1. Casual mode to be matched with more diverse players.
2. Ban hackers in Casual.
